website_summaries.verdict: Take up little to no desk space with this compact, sturdy play stand that charges while you play.
pros: Small stand is made from the quality materials you expect from Nintendo
Effortlessly charge your switch while you play in tabletop mode
The stand takes up little to no room, but is far sturdier than the built-in kickstand on the switch
Switch plugs into the stand (similar to the dock) and stays securely in place
Stand is easy to carry with you
cons: Stand provides no elevation, which can be potentially  straining on your neck

customer_reviews.title: Small, Sturdy, Versatile Use.  Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, both for a great charging stand on my night stand and a small portable stand with varying angles that can charge while playing. Smaller than I expected but sturdy with a solid build. The guide notch behind the charging port makes dropping the Switch in very easy. Although smaller than I thought, I love the size for its portability which is what the Switch is all about. Going forward, Nintendo should just include this in the box. Highly recomended
customer_reviews.author: Samantha B.

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo and Their Neverending List of Thing You Don't Really Need.
customer_reviews.text: You don't really need this product. I thought it did and bought it but then realized I didn't really need it. Nintendo is the master of this, selling you slick, high quality accessories that you actually don't really need. If your Switch's battery is running out it's probably time to take and break and charge it.
customer_reviews.author: I am not a number, I am a free man!

customer_reviews.title: Compact, sturdy, and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it advertises and is far more sturdy than the small stand that's built into the Switch. I found the price to be well worth the quality and portability of this accessory. This stand easily fits into my Switch carrying case, doesn't add hardly any weight or bulk, and works flawlessly. To those who are displeased with this item, I'm guessing you didn't do a lot of research before purchasing. I'm completely satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Wells

customer_reviews.title: Only Nintendo Switch Accessory I've purchased...
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a good price point. Features a small compact design that easily fit in a slim bag or accessory pocket. It feels solid and made with higher quality plastics. Even features an adjustable angle and rubber grips for security. Finally, and most importantly, this provides the official Nintendo NON-STANDARD usb-c protocols that will keep your Switch running nicely. If you didn't know the USB-C protocols in the Nintendo Switch do not "play nice" with third party products and could possibly be related to those third-party accessory bricking issues we saw a few months ago.
customer_reviews.author: B Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good as a stand, not so great as a charging stand
customer_reviews.text: This is something that is best used as a small, portable stand when you play with your Nintendo Switch in portable mode. It's small enough to fit most Nintendo Switch cases, so if you have a case that doesn't have a "built-in stand" and you don't want to use the console's built-in stand, this is a something to consider. I don't recommend charging your Switch with this thing because the stand can easily get moved around by a charging wire, which may cause your switch to fall down. However, the stand is completely stable for holding a Switch as long as you don't connect it with a wire.

product_meta.title: Nintendo Switch Adjustable Charging Stand - Switch
product_meta.description: Play the Nintendo Switch system in tabletop mode at any angle while you charge (AC adapter included with purchase of Nintendo Switch system).
feature_bullets: Play the Nintendo Switch system in tabletop mode at any angle while you charge (AC adapter included with purchase of Nintendo Switch system).
The angle of the stand can also be adjusted to create the best viewing angle for different environments.
The adjustable charging stand allows the Nintendo Switch system to be charging while in Tabletop mode, enabling longer play sessions.
